summary: "The Picture of Dorian Gray" is a book by Oscar Wilde about a beautiful man who stays young and handsome while a magical painting of him ages and shows his sins. Dorian wishes to keep his beauty forever and his wish comes true, but he leads a bad life. As he does bad things, the painting gets uglier. The book is a mix of philosophy and horror, and it caused a lot of controversy when it was first published. Today, it's considered a classic in Gothic literature.
title: The Picture of Dorian Gray
